panel.title: Elevator
panel.bulkAddHint: Select one or more Regions to add as elevator stops.

warn.noElevatorId: Elevator ID not set on this Region.
warn.noTokensInRegion: No tokens in the elevator Region.

info.waitNextRound: Waiting until next round to enable elevator...
info.sentGMRequest: Approval request sent to the GM.
info.sentOwnerRequest: Approval request sent to token owner(s).

gm.approvalPrompt: Approve teleporting tokens to the selected destination?

theme.name: Elevator Panel Theme
theme.hint: Choose the default theme for the Elevator panel.

arrivalDelay.name: Arrival Delay (ms)
arrivalDelay.hint: Delay from calling elevator to arrival when not in combat.

combatDelay.name: Combat Delay Policy
combatDelay.hint: When tokens are combatants, wait until next round before enabling selection.

requireGM.name: Always Require GM Approval
requireGM.hint: If enabled, any group teleport requires GM approval even for owned tokens.

sfx.name: Enable Elevator SFX
sfx.hint: Play optional SFX for call and arrival.

debug.name: Elevator Debug Logging
debug.hint: Log extra elevator state to the browser console (F12).

enabled.label: Enable Elevator
enabled.hint: Turn this Region into an elevator source.

elevatorId.label: Elevator ID
elevatorId.hint: Identifier linking Regions across scenes for the same elevator.

isHere.label: Elevator Is Here
isHere.hint: Mark the elevator as currently present at this Region.

icon.label: Elevator Icon
icon.hint: Custom image for the elevator overlay icon.

iconSize.label: Icon Size
iconSize.hint: Pixel size for the elevator icon.

iconAlwaysOn.label: Show Icon Always
iconAlwaysOn.hint: If enabled, always show the elevator icon on this Region (not only when tokens are inside).

theme.label: Panel Theme
theme.hint: Theme for the elevator panel at this Region.
